addr: 1201 South Figueroa Street. West Hall A. Los Angeles, CA 90015
title: LA Art Show 2016
desc: The LA Art Show: A New Experience  The LA Art Show has refined its focus to bring a freshly curated fair for its 21st edition. The LA Art Show team is constantly driven to present a magnificent art experience that brings together galleries, artists, curators, and collectors. The art fair world is expanding and we are proud to have emerged as one of the world's largest and longest running events with ?150,000 square feet of exhibition space and close to 60,000 attendees this past year. As Los Angeles takes its place as a vanguard of the global art scene, our ability to adapt and evolve to meet the art market's current trends is vital. While dedicated to maintaining our commitment to techniue and integrity we are refining out curatorial vision and presenting galleries that showcase premier Modern and Contemporary work at our 2016 edition. The 21st annual show will build on years of success, with new dates, a new hall, and a new direction affording the fair, our exhibitors, collectors, and tens of thousands of art enthusiasts a new quality experience. LOCATION Los Angeles Convention Center West Hall A, 1201 South Figueroa Street Los Angeles, CA 90015
